item.title: Need help with 2 things (317)
item.dc:creator: @headlights headlights
item.description:
@headlights wrote:

I know this doesn’t answer your question, but don’t use czar. You’re apparently new, so it’s worth me telling you this. The problem with czar is that it is outdated, meaning there isn’t much support for it. Also, it is, quite frankly, a piece of sh*t. You, someone who has just started, should use a source that has lots of tutorials and guides contributing towards it.

Since you are a beginner, I recommend this source. It just happens to be the most popular (according to this), so I’m guessing it has a lot support behind it.

[ol][li]Looks like DeltaScape already has clickingMost.java ;).[/li]
[li]
To update the facing direction of an NPC, find the viewX and viewY fields in NPC.java. You just have to modify those and make sure faceToUpdateRequired is set to true afterwards. You probably didn’t understand a word of that, haha. I advice you to browse the tutorials section. Maybe there is a tutorial that is more user-friendly. Make sure to use the search feature!
[/li][/ol]

P.S. Sorry about the late reply. I was away.

Read full topic
